sentences.en: Every March the Armory Show sets up shop in New York.
sentences.cn: 每年三月,军械博览会都会在纽约设置展场.

sentences.en: He dipped into his intellectual armory to find an answer.
sentences.cn: 他为寻求答案而苦苦思索.

sentences.en: He donned them both and made his way to the armory.
sentences.cn: 他穿戴完毕,便向军械库走去.

sentences.en: In the armory of man, charm is the enchanted dart light and subtle as a hummingbird.
sentences.cn: 在男人的军械库里, 魅力是那带有魔力的刺,像蜂雀一样地轻巧、纤细.

sentences.en: Make it Drizzle : Purchased an item from the Armory.
sentences.cn: 在军械库购买一件道具.

sentences.en: New Game Mechanics including Feron Bloodthirst, a faction based armory, and more.
sentences.cn: 加入了包括费伦嗜血者在内的一系列新机械.

sentences.en: Nuclear weapons will play a less prominent part in NATO's armory in the future.
sentences.cn: 核武器将来在北约的军械中会起较次要的作用。

sentences.en: One photo shows cadets playfully pointing revolvers at colleagues in a room that appears to be an armory.
sentences.cn: 一张照片显示了学员们在军械库里拿左轮手枪开玩笑似的指着同事。

sentences.en: PvE ladders on the official armory are possible in the future.
sentences.cn: 官方英雄榜今后可能有PvE排名.

sentences.en: Springfield armory: weapons factory established at springfield mass. By the u. s. congress in1794.
sentences.cn: 春田兵工厂：美国国会1794年在麻萨诸塞州春田市建立的武器工厂。

sentences.en: The Armory also expands your ground control.
sentences.cn: 它可以扩张您得地面控制力.

sentences.en: The Armory costs 1000 credits, and requires only the barracks.
sentences.cn: 军械库需要的花费是1000, 建造它的前提只有兵营.

sentences.en: The Fragrance Foundation held its 2009 FiFi Awards at the Downtown Armory in New York.
sentences.cn: 该香水基金会举行了2009年香水奥斯卡奖在市区军械库在纽约举行.

sentences.en: The World of Warcraft armory page has just been updated with new features and tools!
sentences.cn: 魔兽世界英雄榜页面更新了新的功能和工具!

words.tran_cn: [军] 兵器制造者；[军] 军械士

trans.tran_cn: 纹章，纹章学，兵工厂，军械库
